text:
e="preserve">Mohamed Haniffa Mohamed (15 June 1921 – 26 April 2016) was a Sri Lankan politician. Mohamed was the 14th Speaker of the Parliament of Sri Lanka (1989–1994) as well as being a former member of Parliament and government minister.
Mohamed was the first Sri Lankan Moor to hold office as Mayor of Colombo from 1960 to 1962.

annotations.surface_form: Speaker of the Parliament of Sri Lanka
